issue.title: Acquisitions after wait do not account for wait time : USB-6343

content.raw:
Hi David,

Apologies for the bug, clearly this was overlooked. You're correct, you would only need to update `extract_measurements()`. You can see how this was intended to work, and then we managed to not follow through on it. A fix would be appreciated! I'll make sure any fix makes its way to all the classes it's needed in - it's probably the case that the separate NI DAQmx devices will be superseded by a  [general NIDAQmx class from the Spielman fork](#!/spielman/labscript_devices/src/8a01e80eecd2015cfb3fbe12cb05c85fda48bafc/NI_DAQmx.py?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default), so I'll make sure it gets there when that gets merged in.
